attributes.contentHtml: Its hard for many hosts. And we just started and we are still learning and starting and we can’t take this. You guys make many small/new hosts quit. And it stressful for them. As of what I think is that altas hosting has chnaged much. And you guys won’t stop us. We have so much to say about you guys . And alk you guys just talk shit and so much. How anout you talk crap about my host with a Tk domain and much more? Huh yea I havent see no report from it. All I want from you guys is respect and kindnice. Thats all I want from you guys. As our founder goes though so much. And you guys are just making it more hard.

attributes.title: Atlas Hosting They Don't Know How To Run A Host
